name: messiahStudio Scene File
summary: Learn about .FXS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Objects from messiahStudio scenes can be exported to a variety of formats, including .OBJ, .3DS, and .DXF formats.

description: 3D scene created by messiahStudio animation and rendering software; stores both model and animation data; used for storing characters and their motions; can include meshes, textures, motions, lighting effects, and other model information.
